ingredients: 1/2 head Red Cabbage, thinly sliced (about 4-5 cups)
(Optional) 2 Tbsp Sunflower Seeds or Sliced Almonds
steps: Thinly slice the red cabbage, grate the carrot, and slice the green onions. Place in a large bowl
In a small bowl, whisk together the apple cider vinegar, olive oil, honey, salt, and pepper
Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture and toss well to coat
Let sit for at least 10 minutes to allow the cabbage to soften slightly and the flavors to meld
Add optional cilantro and seeds just before serving
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days (flavors improve over time)
title: Red Cabbage Slaw
